doc:
Emma Rigby https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Emma_Rigby 0 Emma Catherine Rigby (born 26 September 1989) is an English actress. She is best known for playing the role of Hannah Ashworth in long-running soap opera Hollyoaks, Gemma Roscoe in BBC One drama series Prisoners' Wives and as the Red Queen in American fantasy-drama Once Upon a Time in Wonderland. She played the lead role of Angie in Movies 24's A Cinderella Christmas (2016). She is due to appear in The Protector (2018) a passionflix adaptation of the Jodi Ellen Malpas book. Emma_Catherine_Rigby ( born_26_September_1989 ) is an_English_actress . She is_best_known for playing the_role of Hannah_Ashworth in long-running_soap_opera_Hollyoaks , Gemma_Roscoe in BBC_One_drama_series_Prisoners '_Wives and as the_Red_Queen in American_fantasy-drama Once Upon a_Time in Wonderland . She played the_lead_role of Angie in Movies_24 's_A_Cinderella_Christmas_(_2016_) . She is due to_appear in The_Protector_(_2018 ) a_passionflix_adaptation of the_Jodi_Ellen_Malpas_book .
